title: [Mega Tracking] Align Codebase to Spec v0.3
body:
This issue tracks the overall progress of updating the current beacon chain implementation to spec [v0.3](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/releases/tag/v0.3.0) Here is what has been done so far and the missing steps:

### **Phase 0 Beacon Chain Spec**

üç™ **Features:**

| Descriptions  | Eth2.0 spec PR   | Prysm PR   |
|------------ | ------------- |-------------|
| tighten up eth1 deposit flow |  [594](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/594) [589](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/589)  |   |
| enable transfers btw "withdrawable" accounts  | [601](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/601)  |   |
| switch bitfields to little-endian |  [575](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/575)| #1628  |
| only reward attestations from committees for previous epoch + note on validator set to reward/penalize |  [597](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/597) |   |
| add minimum slashing penalty |  [624](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/624)|   |
| refactor withdrawable |  [615](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/615) |   |

| minor bugs related to ordering/typos/var-mismatch/etc |  [619](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/619) [635](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/635) [637](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/pull/637) |   #1620 |
